Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 3/31/2013, off Erik Bedard (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2013, off Travis Blackley (HOU)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Milwaukee on 4/17/2013...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Miami on 5/6/2013...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/22/2013 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/17/2016 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 8/9/2017 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 4/4/2019 with a Broken Hand, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 7/3/2020...
Drove in 7 runs against Miami on 9/14/2020...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/8/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $20,000,000 per year...
Traded from San Francisco to Miami on 7/31/2022 (Going to SF: C Tony Kemp, P Edward McLaren, C Hank Conger. Going to MIA: C Buster Posey)...
Injured on 10/27/2022 with a Broken Ribs, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2022...
Traded from Minnesota to Miami on 3/2/2023 (Going to MIA: C Buster Posey. Going to MIN: LF Sabino Conde)...
Won World Series with Miami in 2023...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2023...
10/24/2023: Signed a contract extension with Miami, $3,700,000 per year, for 3 years.
Hit 3 homeruns against Cincinnati, driving in 7 runs on 10/4/2024...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 5/4/2025...
Won World Series with Miami in 2025...
